Headline: Westbound #35 31st/35th Temporary Reroute near 35th/Wentworth
ShortDescription: Westbound 35 31st/35th buses are temporarily rerouted via 35th, Shield, 33rd, Wallace, and 35th due to, construction near 35th/Wentworth.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #35 31st/35th buses are temporarily rerouted via 35th, Shield, 33rd, Wallace, and 35th due to, construction near 35th/Wentworth.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Forest Park-bound Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier sick customer at Austin. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier sick customer at Austin

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
